mapper.select: SET LOCK_TIMEOUT 10000; SELECT CHEKSTD.CHS_SORT, CHEKSTD.FAC_CODE, CHEKSTD.CHS_NO, CHEKSTD.CHS_CODE, CHEKSTD.CHS_GUBN, CHEKSTD.CHS_GUBN_DETAIL, CHEKSTD.CHS_HANG, CHEKSTD.CHS_KIJUN, CHEKSTD.CHS_MIN, CHEKSTD.CHS_MAX, CHEKSTD.CHS_DANW, FACILITY.FAC_NO, CHEKSTD.CHS_IMG, FACILITY.FAC_NAME, FACILITY.FAC_GYU, FACILITY.TECH_NO, FACILITY.TECH_NO, TECHIN.TECH_HT, CHS_CHKMETHOD, CHS_STEPMETHOD FROM CHEKSTD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN FACILITY WITH(NOLOCK) ON CHEKSTD.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE INNER JOIN TECHIN WITH(NOLOCK) ON TECHIN.TECH_NO = FACILITY.TECH_NO -- ORDER BY FAC_NAME,CHS_GUBN,CHS_SORT ORDER BY CHS_NO, FAC_CODE
